data.text:
With expectations in my heart, passing through the school gate 
for the first time- That was my start.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>With expectations in my heart, passing through the school gate 
<story>for the first time- That was my start.

data.text: With the Debut completed, I took one step forward…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>With the Debut completed, I took one step forward…

data.text: Finally, for the sake of grasping my dream, my race had begun.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Finally, for the sake of grasping my dream, my race had begun.

data.text:
…[Middle Distance Basics 1]… [Victory 
Percentage and Pace Management]
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>…[Middle Distance Basics 1]… [Victory 
<story>Percentage and Pace Management]

data.text: Hm? Suzuka-san in the library, studying? How rare.
data.name: Matikanefukukitaru
data.processed: <story>Hm? Suzuka-san in the library, studying? How rare.

data.text:
Fukukitaru… Yeah, I was told to study about 
grasping the situation during a race.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>Fukukitaru… Yeah, I was told to study about 
<story>grasping the situation during a race.

data.text:
Makes sense. Choosing your tactics based on distance and track 
conditions was something mentioned in class.
data.name: Matikanefukukitaru
data.processed:
<story>Makes sense. Choosing your tactics based on distance and track 
<story>conditions was something mentioned in class.

data.text:
Ah! If that's the case, shall I try divining it?! 
The perfect strategy for Suzuka-san!
data.name: Matikanefukukitaru
data.processed:
<story>Ah! If that's the case, shall I try divining it?! 
<story>The perfect strategy for Suzuka-san!

data.text:
N-no thanks! 
That's something for my trainer and I to decide.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>N-no thanks! 
<story>That's something for my trainer and I to decide.

data.text:
I see you're frantically trying to gather information, 
has your next race been decided?
data.name: Air Groove
data.processed:
<story>I see you're frantically trying to gather information, 
<story>has your next race been decided?

data.text:
Air Groove… yeah, next up is [Yayoi Sho]. 
It's only a month away.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>Air Groove… yeah, next up is [Yayoi Sho]. 
<story>It's only a month away.

data.text:
It's probably because your debut was somewhat late. If you're 
aiming for Classic Races, your schedule is going to be packed.
data.name: Air Groove
data.processed:
<story>It's probably because your debut was somewhat late. If you're 
<story>aiming for Classic Races, your schedule is going to be packed.

data.text:
But, your victory was overwhelming wasn't it? Leading from 
beginning to end. At the end, extending your lead to 7 lengths.
data.name: Air Groove
data.processed:
<story>But, your victory was overwhelming wasn't it? Leading from 
<story>beginning to end. At the end, extending your lead to 7 lengths.

data.text:
I didn't expect you'd come and watch. 
Thanks for cheering for me.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>I didn't expect you'd come and watch. 
<story>Thanks for cheering for me.

data.text:
Ueee?! You went to cheer Suzuka-san on?! 
I wish you would have invited me too!
data.name: Matikanefukukitaru
data.processed:
<story>Ueee?! You went to cheer Suzuka-san on?! 
<story>I wish you would have invited me too!

data.text: I-I didn't go to cheer, I went to observe!
data.name: Air Groove
data.processed: <story>I-I didn't go to cheer, I went to observe!

data.text:
That aside, Suzuka, from now on things will be serious. 
Continuing to win won't be that simple.
data.name: Air Groove
data.processed:
<story>That aside, Suzuka, from now on things will be serious. 
<story>Continuing to win won't be that simple.

data.text:
I know. 
That's why I find myself here in the library.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>I know. 
<story>That's why I find myself here in the library.

data.text: There's "scenery" that I wish to see…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>There's "scenery" that I wish to see…

data.text: Huu… huuu…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Huu… huuu…

data.text: 1000m in 58.5 seconds… your pace is still a little fast.
data.name: Suzuka's Trainer
data.processed: <story>1000m in 58.5 seconds… your pace is still a little fast.

data.text: …Understood.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>…Understood.

data.text:
[Yayoi Sho] is 2000m, you need to save your stamina 
for the last straight. Let's run it again, this 
time be more mindful of your pace.
data.name: Suzuka's Trainer
data.processed:
<story>[Yayoi Sho] is 2000m, you need to save your stamina 
<story>for the last straight. Let's run it again, this 
<story>time be more mindful of your pace.

data.text:
Your strength is undoubtedly top class. 
With flawless preparation, victory will definitely follow.
data.name: Suzuka's Trainer
data.processed:
<story>Your strength is undoubtedly top class. 
<story>With flawless preparation, victory will definitely follow.

data.text: Understood. I'll do my best…!
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Understood. I'll do my best…!

data.text:
Standard practice in a race is to read the situation, find the 
best timing to take position, and minimize losses.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>Standard practice in a race is to read the situation, find the 
<story>best timing to take position, and minimize losses.

data.text:
Running with that in mind increases the probability of finishing 
first. The most important thing is finishing first.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>Running with that in mind increases the probability of finishing 
<story>first. The most important thing is finishing first.

data.text: The "scenery" that I want to see is definitely there-
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>The "scenery" that I want to see is definitely there-

data.text:
With a 3 length lead, Goal! 
A magnificent finish to the [Yayoi Sho]!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>With a 3 length lead, Goal! 
<story>A magnificent finish to the [Yayoi Sho]!

data.text:
Feeling the effects of her late start, the super popular Silence 
Suzuka comes in 8th. Is it because this is only her second race?!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>Feeling the effects of her late start, the super popular Silence 
<story>Suzuka comes in 8th. Is it because this is only her second race?!

data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>…

data.text:
(How the race develops, positioning, pace management, 
turf and weather conditions…)
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>(How the race develops, positioning, pace management, 
<story>turf and weather conditions…)

data.text:
(So races need to be run while keeping 
all these things in mind, huh?)
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>(So races need to be run while keeping 
<story>all these things in mind, huh?)

data.text: …Last one…!
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>…Last one…!

data.text:
(The sound of my horseshoes. Nobody in 
front of me, just a nice breeze.)
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>(The sound of my horseshoes. Nobody in 
<story>front of me, just a nice breeze.)

data.text:
(Just like this, emptying my mind. I 
want to keep running like this.)
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>(Just like this, emptying my mind. I 
<story>want to keep running like this.)

data.text: Haa… haaa…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Haa… haaa…

data.text: (But, like that, the "scenery" I want to see-)
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>(But, like that, the "scenery" I want to see-)

data.text: It's an Uma Musume!!!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>It's an Uma Musume!!!

data.text: Hyaa?! W-… what…?!
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Hyaa?! W-… what…?!

data.text: Uwaaaaaaah! It's a real live Uma Musume…!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Uwaaaaaaah! It's a real live Uma Musume…!

data.text: U-um, aren't you also… an Uma Musume?
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>U-um, aren't you also… an Uma Musume?

data.text:
That's true, but this is the first time 
I've ever seen another Uma Musume!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>That's true, but this is the first time 
<story>I've ever seen another Uma Musume!

data.text: And! And! That running from before, it was reeeeaaally pretty!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>And! And! That running from before, it was reeeeaaally pretty!

data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>…

data.text:
…Ah?! I-I'm so sorry!! 
For staring at you like that!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>…Ah?! I-I'm so sorry!! 
<story>For staring at you like that!

data.text:
I just transferred to Tracen Academy today. 
I'm called Special Week!!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>I just transferred to Tracen Academy today. 
<story>I'm called Special Week!!
